articles.content: Apple last week launched an updated version of the 13-inch MacBook Pro, and it is the first Mac that is equipped with an updated M2 chip. As it's using a brand new chip, we thought we'd pick up the ‌… [+3343 chars]

articles.title: Mojo Vision CEO successfully wore a smart contact lens in his eye - The Ghost Howls
articles.description: Mojo Vision smart contact lenses have finally be worn inside the eye of a person. The CEO of the company tested them personally with success
articles.content: Today I report news that Im pretty excited to write about: the CEO of Mojo Vision has worn in his eye a functioning smart contact lens and used it for around one hour. This is not 2050, but only 2022… [+11390 chars]
